alert.note: Alert for Northern El Paso County, Monument Ridge, Rampart Range Below 7500 Ft (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 07 at 6:47PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern El Paso County through 730 PM MDT... At 647 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Simla, or 23 miles southwest of Limon, moving northwest at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph, penny size hail and very heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Ramah. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
